data.title: A greenhouse data center
data.meta_description: RISE is a state owned research institute collaborating with academia, industry and society as a central part of the Swedish innovation system. Welcome to  RISE!
data.text:
They are to open a new food production + data center in Jämtland

The data center company Ecodatacenter is to open a new data center. This time it will be in Jämtland, and takes place in connection with a major sustainability investment in Östersund. The establishment takes place together with the company Wa3rm, which uses residual streams, for example waste heat from data centers in particular but also other industry, for greenhouses.

Mattias Vesterlund was interviewed by P4 Jämtland about our experiences with greenhouses and data centers. Mattias describes what we have done and how large the potential is. He talks about our own experiments over several years and the large facility being built in Boden.

Find the news here: https://sverigesradio.se/avsnitt/2145001

Go to 1:12:11 and listen 4 minutes.
